00021 #include <iostream>
00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 #include "image/mcv.h"
00025 #include "image_class_example.h"
00026 
00027 image_class_example::image_class_example(int _class_index, 
00028                                          float u, float v, float scale, 
00029                                          object_view * ov, 
00030                                          int patch_size)
00031 {
00032   point2d = new keypoint; //< TODO: delete this keypoint somewhere.
00033   point2d->u = u;
00034   point2d->v = v;
00035   point2d->scale = scale;
00036   preprocessed = cvCreateImage(cvSize(patch_size, patch_size), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1);
00037 
00038   view = ov;
00039 
00040   class_index = _class_index;
00041 
00042   original_image = 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 image_class_example::image_class_example(int p_class_index, IplImage * image)
00046 {
00047   class_index = p_class_index;
00048   point2d = 0;
00049 
00050   original_image = cvCloneImage(image);
00051 }
00052 
00053 image_class_example::image_class_example()
00054 {
00055   point2d = 0;
00056   original_image = 0;
00057   preprocessed = 0;
00058   view = 0;
00059 }
00060 
00061 image_class_example::~image_class_example(void)
00062 {
00063   if (preprocessed) cvReleaseImage(&preprocessed);
00064   if (original_image) cvReleaseImage(&original_image);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void image_class_example::alloc(int sz) {
00068   preprocessed = cvCreateImage(cvSize(sz, sz), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1);
00069 }
